key.name: background-mode
key.description: Determines how the wallpaper is rendered.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Color to display under the image (if it has alpha), or as a replacement for the image (if background-mode is 'Color').

key.name: vera-color
key.description: The @vera-color property exported to the GTK+ theme.

key.name: vera-color-lock
key.description: If true, the vera-color key will not be changed with the dominant color of the current wallpaper.

key.name: show-tutorial
key.description: If true, the tutorial will be shown. Note that you need to restart vera after changing the value.
